channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Login No Captcha reCAPTCHA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Login No Captcha reCAPTCHA

item.title: CVE-2022-2913|2024-08-03T00:52:59.981Z -- unknown -- login%20no%20captcha%20recaptcha
item.description: The Login No Captcha reCAPTCHA WordPress plugin before 1.7 doesn't check the proper IP address allowing attackers to spoof IP addresses on the allow list and bypass the need for captcha on the login screen.
